name: Shin Galaxy: Alpha War
description:
This is the Alpha Demo for the game Shin galaxy: Alpha War a space shooter with some RPG mechanics, where the player can improve the attributes of each space ship. In addition, the player will be able to count on other space ships, which will have unique elements. The idea of this game is to entertain the player with a lot of content, skins and achievements to unlock, records to be beaten, stages to be completed.

For now, the mobile version is being worked on. After this version is finished, we will work for PC and Consoles :) .

Thanks for visiting the page and feel free to try the demo!!
